IAPSC - International Association of Professional Security Consultants

November 19, 2024

IAPSC - International Association of Professional Security Consultants

https://www.linkedin.com/company/iapsc/posts/?feedView=all

In last month's IAPSC & SIA webinar, industry experts provided an insider’s perspective on maximizing value with security consultants - whether for a technology upgrade or an enterprise-wide audit. Panelists drew from experience on thousands of projects, sharing practical insights on leveraging consulting partnerships to enhance security initiatives.
